column.name: sampling_time_start
column.comment: Time stamp when the observation was started or phenomenon was observed

column.name: sampling_time_end
column.comment: Time stamp when the observation was stopped or phenomenon was observed

column.name: resultTime
column.comment: Time stamp when the observation was published or result was published/available

column.name: identifier
column.comment: The identifier of the observation, gml:identifier. Used as parameter for queries. Optional but unique

column.name: fk_identifier_codespace_id
column.comment: Relation/foreign key to the codespace table. Contains the gml:identifier codespace. Optional

column.name: name
column.comment: The name of the observation, gml:name. Optional

column.name: fk_name_codespace_id
column.comment: The name of the observation, gml:name. Optional

column.name: description
column.comment: Description of the observation, gml:description. Optional

column.name: is_deleted
column.comment: Flag to indicate that this dataset is deleted or not. Set if the related procedure is deleted via DeleteSensor operation (OGC SWES 2.0 - DeleteSensor operation)

column.name: valid_time_start
column.comment: Start time stamp for which the observation/result is valid, e.g. used for forecasting. Optional

column.name: valid_time_end
column.comment: End time stamp for which the observation/result is valid, e.g. used for forecasting. Optional

column.name: is_child
column.comment: Flag to indicate that this observation is a child observation for complex observation

column.name: is_parent
column.comment: Flag to indicate that this observation is a parent observation for complex observation

column.name: value_identifier
column.comment: SweText observation identifier

column.name: value_name
column.comment: SweText observation name

column.name: value_description
column.comment: SweText observation description

column.name: validation
column.comment: AQD e-Reporting validation flag, see http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/observationvalidity/view

column.name: verification
column.comment: AQD e-Reporting verification flag, see http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/observationverification/view

column.name: primary_observation
column.comment: AQD e-Reporting primaryObservation type, see http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/primaryObservation/view

column.name: time_coverage_flag
column.comment: AQD e-Reporting time coverage quality flag

column.name: data_capture_flag
column.comment: AQD e-Reporting data capture quality flag

column.name: dataCapture
column.comment: AQD e-Reporting data capture value, required for multiday observations

column.name: uncertainty_estimation
column.comment: AQD e-Reporting uncertainty estimation quality value
